title: Derontae Martin /// Part 1 /// 505
description:
Derontae Martin /// Part 1 /// 505

Part 1 of 2
www.TrueCrimeGarage.com

19 year old Derontae Martin was found dead from a gunshot in the attic of another families home in the early hours of April 25. Derontae’s family wants answers and so do we. Join us in the Garage for a couple of cold ones and some of the cold hard facts of this very tragic case.


Beer of the Week - Out Here by Mast Landing Brewing Company Garage Grade - 4 out of 5 Bottle Caps


Checkout our other show - True Crime Garage “Off the Record” available on Stitcher Premium. For a FREE month of listening go tohttps://www.stitcherpremium.com/truecrimegarage

Beer Fund: https://truecrimegarage.com/home
